column2: The Petitioner has  invoked the jurisdiction of this Court seeking,  a mandate
in  the  nature  of writ  of Certiorari  to  quash  a  part  of an  order  given  by  the  1st
Respondent  (Commissioner  General  of Labour)  Ref.  TEUAlAl1112008,  marked
P7,  dated 06/12/2013,  which contains the payment of back wages to the Petitioner

column1:
from  08/02/2008 
to  02/04/2009.  This  order  was  made  by

column2: subsequent to  a Judgment given by this  Court in  CA.  (writ) 539/2010,  marked P3,
directing the  1 st  Respondent to  make an  appropriate order for re-instatement of the

column1: 2nd  Respondent,  (workman)  "with  wages  and  other  benefits  which  the  workman.

column2: would  have  received  if his  services  had not been  terminated".  The  1 st  Respondent
